BEHIND EVERY GREAT THEME A GREAT TEAM

[/vc_column_text][kswr_lineseparator ls_height="3" ls_color="{``type``:``color``,``color1``:``#444444``,``color2``:``#333``,``direction``:``to left``}" ls_alignement="left" ls_style="from-left" ls_width="45px" ls_margins="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:0px;margin-right:0px;"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1483479919910{margin-bottom: 22px !important;padding-top: 22px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"]

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence.
